results.title: A New Mechanism in Steroid-Induced Osteonecrosis of the Femoral Head and the Protective Role of Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: This study demonstrates, for the first time, that glucocorticoid-induced disruptions in @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ @CHEMICAL_Cardiolipins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002308 @@@cardiolipin@@@ metabolism contribute to the pathogenesis of SONFH by inducing @GENE_CYCS @GENE_54205 @@@Cyt-c@@@ release and subsequent osteoblast apoptosis. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ exerts a protective effect by preserving @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ integrity and function, offering a potential therapeutic avenue for treating hormone-induced @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@osteoblast damage@@@ in SONFH.

citations.NLM: Li XH, Qian SD, Chen D, Li ZZ, Chen KY, Pan YP, Lv XH, Jia RQ, Yu XF. A New Mechanism in Steroid-Induced Osteonecrosis of the Femoral Head and the Protective Role of Simvastatin. Exp Cell Res. 2025 Feb 18;446(1):114471. PMID: 39978720

results.title: Protective role of simvastatin on lung damage caused by burn and cotton smoke inhalation in rats.
results.text_hl: Also, immunopathologic data revealed that epithelial @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_24599 @@@iNOS@@@ level was elevated, while no modulation was detected in the level of @GENE_MPO @GENE_303413 @@@myeloperoxidase@@@ (@GENE_MPO @GENE_303413 @@@MPO@@@). @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ administration resulted in decreasing the lung parenchymal and @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@tracheoepithelial damage@@@.

results.title: Squalestatin protects neurons and reduces the activation of cytoplasmic phospholipase A2 by Abeta(1-42).
results.text_hl: Pre-treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a clinically relevant statin that penetrates the brain, protected against Abeta(1-42) induced @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@synapse damage@@@ and @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal death@@@ in vitro.

results.title: Simvastatin reduces reperfusion injury by modulating nitric oxide synthase expression: an ex vivo study in isolated working rat hearts.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: In this model, in the absence of perfusing granulocytes, the acute administration of a pharmacologically relevant @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ concentration reduces @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia-@@@@DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion injury@@@ and prevents @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary endothelial@@@ cell and @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@cardiomyocyte damage@@@ by @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-independent, NO-dependent mechanisms.

citations.NLM: Di Napoli P, Antonio Taccardi A, Grilli A, Spina R, Felaco M, Barsotti A, De Caterina R. Simvastatin reduces reperfusion injury by modulating nitric oxide synthase expression: an ex vivo study in isolated working rat hearts. Cardiovasc Res. 2001 Aug 1;51(2):283-93. PMID: 11470468
